title: Examen: Servicio al Cliente y Adverbios

questions.question: What is a 'Refund'?
options: A formal complaint to the manager
Money given back to a customer
An error in a bank document
A delay in a wire transfer
questions.explanation: Un 'refund' es la devolución de dinero.

questions.question: Where do you place the adverb of frequency with the verb 'To Be'?
options: Before the verb (e.g., I always am)
After the verb (e.g., I am always)
At the end of the sentence
At the beginning of the sentence
questions.explanation: Con el verbo 'to be', el adverbio va después (I am always).

questions.question: If something happens 0% of the time, which adverb do you use?
What should you do if there is a 'mistake' on your bank statement?
questions.explanation: Si hay un error, debes hacer una reclamación (make a complaint).

questions.question: Which sentence is grammatically correct?
questions.explanation: El adverbio va antes del verbo principal (often check).
